unnormalised: **Entertainment Buzz: Film Fest Fever Grips the Nation!**
normalised: **Entertainment Buzz: Film Fest Fever Grips the Nation!**

unnormalised: Hey Bollywood buffs! Film festival season is officially ON! From the Jio MAMI Mumbai Film Festival (dates TBD, folks!) to smaller indie fests popping up everywhere, there's something for every movie lover.
normalised: Hey Bollywood buffs! Film festival season is officially ON! From the Jio M A M I Mumbai Film Festival (dates T B D, folks!) to smaller indie fests popping up everywhere, there's something for every movie lover.

unnormalised: Word on the street is that the Kolkata International Film Festival is gearing up for another year of cinematic brilliance – expect screenings from across the globe and plenty of chai breaks in between.
normalised: Word on the street is that the Kolkata International Film Festival is gearing up for another year of cinematic brilliance – expect screenings from across the globe and plenty of chai breaks in between.

unnormalised: Meanwhile, down south, whispers are circulating about a new film festival potentially coinciding with Onam celebrations in Kerala. Imagine feasting on sadhya and then diving into art-house films!
normalised: Meanwhile, down south, whispers are circulating about a new film festival potentially coinciding with Onam celebrations in Kerala. Imagine feasting on sadhya and then diving into art-house films!

unnormalised: Remember that short film, "Asha's Dream," which won big at IFFI, Goa last year? Keep an eye out for the director, Priya Sharma – sources say she's working on a feature film.
normalised: Remember that short film, "Asha's Dream," which won big at I F F I, Goa last year? Keep an eye out for the director, Priya Sharma – sources say she's working on a feature film.

unnormalised: Plus, rumour has it that a Bollywood biggie, maybe even King Khan himself, might grace one of these fests with their presence. So, get your passes ready and prepare for some serious cinematic indulgence.
normalised: Plus, rumour has it that a Bollywood biggie, maybe even King Khan himself, might grace one of these fests with their presence. So, get your passes ready and prepare for some serious cinematic indulgence.
